items.title: Student ‘traumatised’ after managing to break her jaw with aptly-named candy
items.description: Her jaw will have to be wired shut for the next six weeks.

items.title: Chicken gets her own hi-vis jacket to help cross the road
items.description: Billie used to follow kids to school.

items.title: ‘Mosh pit nappy’ released to help people avoid long queues for the loo at gigs
items.description: It comes after a number of incidents of fans refusing to leave the pit at shows...under any circumstances.

items.title: Shop owner makes 50 citizen’s arrests because shoplifting at his store is so bad
items.description: Martin Gaunt fights back against retail crime through unexpected method

items.title: Builders pour concrete over newly built bus stand and now nobody can use it
items.description: People are working out how to sit properly on the submerged seats.
